{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
constexpr /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt; begin();
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1=
constexpr /*iterator*/&lt;true&gt; begin() const
  requires ranges::range&lt;const V&gt; &amp;&amp;
           std::regular_invocable&lt;const F&amp;, ranges::range_reference_t&lt;const V&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns an {{rlp|iterator}} to the first element of the {{tt|transform_view}}.

@1@ Equivalent to {{c|return /*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;{*this, ranges::begin(base_)};}}, where {{rlpi|/#Data members|base_}} is the underlying view.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|return /*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;{*this, ranges::begin(base_)};}}, where {{tti|base_}} is the underlying view.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Iterator to the first element.
